posts.post_content:
Commander sure has some insane reprints. Never imagined we'd see stuff like this, [Sol Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sol Ring) or [Lightning Greaves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Greaves) reprinted.
  
Awesome in practice, and it leads to awkwardly funny moments such as "Dude, you just [Force Spike](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Force Spike)'d my Mother!".
  
And it's already time for [Mother of Runes](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mother of Runes) vs. [Mother of Goons](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mother of Goons) duel decks.
